column5: Will be fishing around the Sioux Lookout area June 6-9. What will the mosquito/black fly situation be in that area then.Thanks!Brian
bout the same as last year only more ofem n hungrier.
The bugs are thick this year and bigger than normal. I heard a story a while back of a swarm dragging off a small child. The dad was armed and he had to shoot them, they were that big.
